## Functions

### createDedicatedExit() {#a087b8382e9e76fa52c0c473b14f7d37d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static MachineBasicBlock &#42; createDedicatedExit (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; Loop, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; Exit)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Create a dedicated exit for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>.

Exit is the original exit for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a>. If it is already dedicated exit, return it. Otherwise, insert a new block between them and return the new block.

<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Generate the pipeline epilog code. The epilog code finishes the iterations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that were started in either the prolog or the kernel.  We create a basic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// block for each stage that needs to complete.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ModuloScheduleExpander::generateEpilog(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastStage, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;KernelBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;OrigBB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ValueMapTy &#42;VRMap, ValueMapTy &#42;VRMapPhi, MBBVectorTy &amp;EpilogBBs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MBBVectorTy &amp;PrologBBs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to change the branch from the kernel to the first epilog block, so</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastStageNum, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurStageNum, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsLast) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the stage number for the initial value of the Phi, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// comes from the prolog. The prolog to use depends on to which kernel/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// epilog that we&#39;re adding the Phi.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PrologStage = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PrevStage = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InKernel = (LastStageNum == CurStageNum);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InKernel) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PrologStage = LastStageNum - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PrevStage = CurStageNum;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PrologStage = LastStageNum - (CurStageNum - LastStageNum);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PrevStage = LastStageNum + (CurStageNum - LastStageNum) - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> BBI = BB-&gt;instr&#95;begin(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   BBE = BB-&gt;getFirstNonPHI();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">       BBI != BBE; ++BBI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a> = BBI-&gt;getOperand(0).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InitVal = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopVal = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinepipeliner-cpp/#ad4cf8c8e4e2cc5bf94656e979ed629b4">getPhiRegs</a>(&#42;BBI, BB, InitVal, LoopVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PhiOp1 = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The Phi value from the loop body typically is defined in the loop, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not always. So, we need to check if the value is defined in the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PhiOp2 = LoopVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It = VRMap&#91;LastStageNum&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a086e9fbdb06276db7753101a08a63adf">find</a>(LoopVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">        It != VRMap&#91;LastStageNum&#93;.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PhiOp2 = It-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StageScheduled = Schedule.getStage(&amp;&#42;BBI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopValStage = Schedule.getStage(MRI.getVRegDef(LoopVal));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumStages = getStagesForReg(Def, CurStageNum);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumStages == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We don&#39;t need to generate a Phi anymore, but we need to rename any uses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the Phi value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewReg = VRMap&#91;PrevStage&#93;&#91;LoopVal&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">      rewriteScheduledInstr(NewBB, InstrMap, CurStageNum, 0, &amp;&#42;BBI, Def,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            InitVal, NewReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VRMap&#91;CurStageNum&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(LoopVal))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">        VRMap&#91;CurStageNum&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93; = VRMap&#91;CurStageNum&#93;&#91;LoopVal&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adjust the number of Phis needed depending on the number of prologs left,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and the distance from where the Phi is first scheduled. The number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Phis cannot exceed the number of prolog stages. Each stage can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// potentially define two values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxPhis = PrologStage + 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!InKernel &amp;&amp; (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)PrologStage &lt;= LoopValStage)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MaxPhis = std::max((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)MaxPhis - (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)LoopValStage, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumPhis = std::min(NumStages, MaxPhis);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewReg = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AccessStage = (LoopValStage != -1) ? LoopValStage : StageScheduled;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the epilog, we may need to look back one stage to get the correct</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Phi name, because the epilog and prolog blocks execute the same stage.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The correct name is from the previous block only when the Phi has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// been completely scheduled prior to the epilog, and Phi value is not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// needed in multiple stages.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StageDiff = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!InKernel &amp;&amp; StageScheduled &gt;= LoopValStage &amp;&amp; AccessStage == 0 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NumPhis == 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">      StageDiff = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adjust the computations below when the phi and the loop definition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are scheduled in different stages.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InKernel &amp;&amp; LoopValStage != -1 &amp;&amp; StageScheduled &gt; LoopValStage)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">      StageDiff = StageScheduled - LoopValStage;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> np = 0; np &lt; NumPhis; ++np) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the Phi hasn&#39;t been scheduled, then use the initial Phi operand</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value. Otherwise, use the scheduled version of the instruction. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is a little complicated when a Phi references another Phi.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (np &gt; PrologStage || StageScheduled &gt;= (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)LastStageNum)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PhiOp1 = InitVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the Phi has already been scheduled in a prolog stage.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PrologStage &gt;= AccessStage + StageDiff + np &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">               VRMap&#91;PrologStage - StageDiff - np&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(LoopVal) != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PhiOp1 = VRMap&#91;PrologStage - StageDiff - np&#93;&#91;LoopVal&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the Phi has already been scheduled, but the loop instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is either another Phi, or doesn&#39;t occur in the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PrologStage &gt;= AccessStage + StageDiff + np) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the Phi references another Phi, we need to examine the other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Phi to get the correct value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PhiOp1 = LoopVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MachineInstr &#42;InstOp1 = MRI.getVRegDef(PhiOp1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Indirects = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InstOp1 &amp;&amp; InstOp1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad43bf1af480830a4d6604e969e3f38e9">isPHI</a>() &amp;&amp; InstOp1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a1e855100f407ca4be098d0050be403b0">getParent</a>() == BB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PhiStage = Schedule.getStage(InstOp1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)(PrologStage - StageDiff - np) &lt; PhiStage + Indirects)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">            PhiOp1 = <a href="#ac9dc42645b503479257f220db42a4c00">getInitPhiReg</a>(&#42;InstOp1, BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">            PhiOp1 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinepipeliner-cpp/#a8c6faeaacd5c214d9ebeeecfe5900706">getLoopPhiReg</a>(&#42;InstOp1, BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlight">          InstOp1 = MRI.getVRegDef(PhiOp1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PhiOpStage = Schedule.getStage(InstOp1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StageAdj = (PhiOpStage != -1 ? PhiStage - PhiOpStage : 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PhiOpStage != -1 &amp;&amp; PrologStage - StageAdj &gt;= Indirects + np) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a> = VRMap&#91;PrologStage - StageAdj - Indirects - np&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>.find(PhiOp1); It != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>.end()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlight">              PhiOp1 = It-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ++Indirects;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PhiOp1 = InitVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this references a generated Phi in the kernel, get the Phi operand</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from the incoming block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MachineInstr &#42;InstOp1 = MRI.getVRegDef(PhiOp1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InstOp1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad43bf1af480830a4d6604e969e3f38e9">isPHI</a>() &amp;&amp; InstOp1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a1e855100f407ca4be098d0050be403b0">getParent</a>() == KernelBB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">          PhiOp1 = <a href="#ac9dc42645b503479257f220db42a4c00">getInitPhiReg</a>(&#42;InstOp1, KernelBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MachineInstr &#42;PhiInst = MRI.getVRegDef(LoopVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopDefIsPhi = PhiInst &amp;&amp; PhiInst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad43bf1af480830a4d6604e969e3f38e9">isPHI</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the epilog, a map lookup is needed to get the value from the kernel,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or previous epilog block. How is does this depends on if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction is scheduled in the previous block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!InKernel) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StageDiffAdj = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LoopValStage != -1 &amp;&amp; StageScheduled &gt; LoopValStage)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">          StageDiffAdj = StageScheduled - LoopValStage;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use the loop value defined in the kernel, unless the kernel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contains the last definition of the Phi.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (np == 0 &amp;&amp; PrevStage == LastStageNum &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">            (StageScheduled != 0 || LoopValStage != 0) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">            VRMap&#91;PrevStage - StageDiffAdj&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(LoopVal))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">          PhiOp2 = VRMap&#91;PrevStage - StageDiffAdj&#93;&#91;LoopVal&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use the value defined by the Phi. We add one because we switch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from looking at the loop value to the Phi definition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (np &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; PrevStage == LastStageNum &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 VRMap&#91;PrevStage - np + 1&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(Def))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">          PhiOp2 = VRMap&#91;PrevStage - np + 1&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use the loop value defined in the kernel.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(LoopValStage) &gt; PrologStage + 1 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 VRMap&#91;PrevStage - StageDiffAdj - np&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(LoopVal))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">          PhiOp2 = VRMap&#91;PrevStage - StageDiffAdj - np&#93;&#91;LoopVal&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use the value defined by the Phi, unless we&#39;re generating the first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// epilog and the Phi refers to a Phi in a different stage.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VRMap&#91;PrevStage - np&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(Def) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 (!LoopDefIsPhi || (PrevStage != LastStageNum) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  (LoopValStage == StageScheduled)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">          PhiOp2 = VRMap&#91;PrevStage - np&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if we can reuse an existing Phi. This occurs when a Phi</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// references another Phi, and the other Phi is scheduled in an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// earlier stage. We can try to reuse an existing Phi up until the last</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stage of the current Phi.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LoopDefIsPhi) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(PrologStage - np) &gt;= StageScheduled) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LVNumStages = getStagesForPhi(LoopVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StageDiff = (StageScheduled - LoopValStage);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">          LVNumStages -= StageDiff;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure the loop value Phi has been processed already.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LVNumStages &gt; (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)np &amp;&amp; VRMap&#91;CurStageNum&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(LoopVal)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">            NewReg = PhiOp2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ReuseStage = CurStageNum;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isLoopCarried(&#42;PhiInst))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">              ReuseStage -= LVNumStages;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the Phi to reuse has been generated yet. If not, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there is nothing to reuse.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VRMap&#91;ReuseStage - np&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(LoopVal)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">              NewReg = VRMap&#91;ReuseStage - np&#93;&#91;LoopVal&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">              rewriteScheduledInstr(NewBB, InstrMap, CurStageNum, np, &amp;&#42;BBI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    Def, NewReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the map with the new Phi name.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">              VRMap&#91;CurStageNum - np&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93; = NewReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">              PhiOp2 = NewReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VRMap&#91;LastStageNum - np - 1&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(LoopVal))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">                PhiOp2 = VRMap&#91;LastStageNum - np - 1&#93;&#91;LoopVal&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsLast &amp;&amp; np == NumPhis - 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlight">                <a href="#adae6899676da32051a20f083232f1020">replaceRegUsesAfterLoop</a>(Def, NewReg, BB, MRI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InKernel &amp;&amp; StageDiff &gt; 0 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">            VRMap&#91;CurStageNum - StageDiff - np&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(LoopVal))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">          PhiOp2 = VRMap&#91;CurStageNum - StageDiff - np&#93;&#91;LoopVal&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetRegisterClass &#42;RC = MRI.getRegClass(Def);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewReg = MRI.createVirtualRegister(RC);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MachineInstrBuilder NewPhi =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;NewBB, NewBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#aa7dc7faaab4856b8f0014b8283e26c7b">getFirstNonPHI</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf-linker/#a463a58e257d5f6fb2c39eb9a2474fc24ac2e06fc138163b7095fa483616a0a47a">DebugLoc</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  TII-&gt;get(TargetOpcode::PHI), NewReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewPhi.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(PhiOp1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#abf1febf2a98f588146548a3a485d3838">addMBB</a>(BB1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewPhi.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(PhiOp2).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#abf1febf2a98f588146548a3a485d3838">addMBB</a>(BB2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LIS.InsertMachineInstrInMaps(&#42;NewPhi);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (np == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">        InstrMap&#91;NewPhi&#93; = &amp;&#42;BBI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We define the Phis after creating the new pipelined code, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we need to rename the Phi values in scheduled instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PrevReg = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InKernel &amp;&amp; VRMap&#91;PrevStage - np&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(LoopVal))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PrevReg = VRMap&#91;PrevStage - np&#93;&#91;LoopVal&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">      rewriteScheduledInstr(NewBB, InstrMap, CurStageNum, np, &amp;&#42;BBI, Def,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            NewReg, PrevReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the Phi has been scheduled, use the new name for rewriting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VRMap&#91;CurStageNum - np&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(Def)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = VRMap&#91;CurStageNum - np&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">        rewriteScheduledInstr(NewBB, InstrMap, CurStageNum, np, &amp;&#42;BBI, R,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              NewReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if we need to rename any uses that occurs after the loop. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register to replace depends on whether the Phi is scheduled in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// epilog.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsLast &amp;&amp; np == NumPhis - 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="#adae6899676da32051a20f083232f1020">replaceRegUsesAfterLoop</a>(Def, NewReg, BB, MRI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the kernel, a dependent Phi uses the value from this Phi.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InKernel)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PhiOp2 = NewReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the map with the new Phi name.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">      VRMap&#91;CurStageNum - np&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93; = NewReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumPhis++ &lt; NumStages) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlight">      rewriteScheduledInstr(NewBB, InstrMap, CurStageNum, NumPhis, &amp;&#42;BBI, Def,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            NewReg, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if we need to rename a Phi that has been eliminated due to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scheduling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumStages == 0 &amp;&amp; IsLast) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;CurStageMap = VRMap&#91;CurStageNum&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It = CurStageMap.find(LoopVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (It != CurStageMap.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="#adae6899676da32051a20f083232f1020">replaceRegUsesAfterLoop</a>(Def, It-&gt;second, BB, MRI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Generate Phis for the specified block in the generated pipelined code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// These are new Phis needed because the definition is scheduled after the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// use in the pipelined sequence.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ModuloScheduleExpander::generatePhis(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;NewBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;BB1, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;BB2,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;KernelBB, ValueMapTy &#42;VRMap, ValueMapTy &#42;VRMapPhi,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlight">    InstrMapTy &amp;InstrMap, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastStageNum, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurStageNum,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsLast) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the stage number that contains the initial Phi value, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the Phi from the previous stage.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PrologStage = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PrevStage = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StageDiff = CurStageNum - LastStageNum;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InKernel = (StageDiff == 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InKernel) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PrologStage = LastStageNum - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PrevStage = CurStageNum;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PrologStage = LastStageNum - StageDiff;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PrevStage = LastStageNum + StageDiff - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> BBI = BB-&gt;getFirstNonPHI(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   BBE = BB-&gt;instr&#95;end();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">       BBI != BBE; ++BBI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = BBI-&gt;getNumOperands(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MachineOperand &amp;MO = BBI-&gt;getOperand(i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4c9594c955fec80c73ddd964b5efd554">isReg</a>() || !MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a75eb135014670ce946e78739cdc9b51b">isDef</a>() || !MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#ab203bbcbc320180b1da9e9a92ee0c784">isVirtual</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StageScheduled = Schedule.getStage(&amp;&#42;BBI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(StageScheduled != -1 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expecting scheduled instruction.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a> = MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumPhis = getStagesForReg(Def, CurStageNum);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An instruction scheduled in stage 0 and is used after the loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// requires a phi in the epilog for the last definition from either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the kernel or prolog.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!InKernel &amp;&amp; NumPhis == 0 &amp;&amp; StageScheduled == 0 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="#ac798656b15d5b309da9e0cf04880d2d6">hasUseAfterLoop</a>(Def, BB, MRI))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NumPhis = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!InKernel &amp;&amp; (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)StageScheduled &gt; PrologStage)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PhiOp2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InKernel) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PhiOp2 = VRMap&#91;PrevStage&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MachineInstr &#42;InstOp2 = MRI.getVRegDef(PhiOp2))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InstOp2-&gt;isPHI() &amp;&amp; InstOp2-&gt;getParent() == NewBB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">            PhiOp2 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinepipeliner-cpp/#a8c6faeaacd5c214d9ebeeecfe5900706">getLoopPhiReg</a>(&#42;InstOp2, BB2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The number of Phis can&#39;t exceed the number of prolog stages. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prolog stage number is zero based.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumPhis &gt; PrologStage + 1 - StageScheduled)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NumPhis = PrologStage + 1 - StageScheduled;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> np = 0; np &lt; NumPhis; ++np) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Org:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Org = ... (Scheduled at Stage#0, NumPhi = 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prolog0 (Stage0):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Clone0 = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prolog1 (Stage1):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Clone1 = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Kernel (Stage2):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Phi0 = Phi %Clone1, Prolog1, %Clone2, Kernel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Phi1 = Phi %Clone0, Prolog1, %Phi0, Kernel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Clone2 = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Epilog0 (Stage3):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Phi2 = Phi %Clone1, Prolog1, %Clone2, Kernel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Phi3 = Phi %Clone0, Prolog1, %Phi0, Kernel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Epilog1 (Stage4):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %Phi4 = Phi %Clone0, Prolog0, %Phi2, Epilog0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VRMap = &#123;0: %Clone0, 1: %Clone1, 2: %Clone2&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VRMapPhi (after Kernel) = &#123;0: %Phi1, 1: %Phi0&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VRMapPhi (after Epilog0) = &#123;0: %Phi3, 1: %Phi2&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PhiOp1 = VRMap&#91;PrologStage&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (np &lt;= PrologStage)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlight">          PhiOp1 = VRMap&#91;PrologStage - np&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!InKernel) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PrevStage == LastStageNum &amp;&amp; np == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlight">            PhiOp2 = VRMap&#91;LastStageNum&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlight">            PhiOp2 = VRMapPhi&#91;PrevStage - np&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetRegisterClass &#42;RC = MRI.getRegClass(Def);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> NewReg = MRI.createVirtualRegister(RC);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MachineInstrBuilder NewPhi =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;NewBB, NewBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#aa7dc7faaab4856b8f0014b8283e26c7b">getFirstNonPHI</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf-linker/#a463a58e257d5f6fb2c39eb9a2474fc24ac2e06fc138163b7095fa483616a0a47a">DebugLoc</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    TII-&gt;get(TargetOpcode::PHI), NewReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NewPhi.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(PhiOp1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#abf1febf2a98f588146548a3a485d3838">addMBB</a>(BB1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NewPhi.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(PhiOp2).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#abf1febf2a98f588146548a3a485d3838">addMBB</a>(BB2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LIS.InsertMachineInstrInMaps(&#42;NewPhi);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (np == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">          InstrMap&#91;NewPhi&#93; = &amp;&#42;BBI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rewrite uses and update the map. The actions depend upon whether</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we generating code for the kernel or epilog blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InKernel) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">          rewriteScheduledInstr(NewBB, InstrMap, CurStageNum, np, &amp;&#42;BBI, PhiOp1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                NewReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">          rewriteScheduledInstr(NewBB, InstrMap, CurStageNum, np, &amp;&#42;BBI, PhiOp2,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                NewReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">          PhiOp2 = NewReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlight">          VRMapPhi&#91;PrevStage - np - 1&#93;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>&#93; = NewReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  NewReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsLast &amp;&amp; np == NumPhis - 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="#adae6899676da32051a20f083232f1020">replaceRegUsesAfterLoop</a>(Def, NewReg, BB, MRI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Remove instructions that generate values with no uses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Typically, these are induction variable operations that generate values</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// used in the loop itself.  A dead instruction has a definition with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// no uses, or uses that occur in the original loop only.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ModuloScheduleExpander::removeDeadInstructions(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;KernelBB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                    MBBVectorTy &amp;EpilogBBs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each epilog block, check that the value defined by each instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is used.  If not, delete it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MachineBasicBlock &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">llvm::reverse</a>(EpilogBBs))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#afde32735260c30997acd66990e80a320">MachineBasicBlock::reverse&#95;instr&#95;iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a3758eeb6d9f052f15217146b4ae4d5a1">instr&#95;rbegin</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                   ME = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ab42a834f1ab8e65b6f525a5cb23a4fe7">instr&#95;rend</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For loop carried definitions, we split the lifetime of a virtual register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that has uses past the definition in the next iteration. A copy with a new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// virtual register is inserted before the definition, which helps with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// generating a better register assignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   v1 = phi(a, v2)     v1 = phi(a, v2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   v2 = phi(b, v3)     v2 = phi(b, v3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   v3 = ..             v4 = copy v1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   .. = V1             v3 = ..</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                       .. = v4</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1767"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/peelingmoduloscheduleexpander/#a8591900a7378c95e5875f531330085c1">AvailableStages</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/peelingmoduloscheduleexpander/#adc9121612a5b5ebbb0daa72dc10f93fc">BB</a>&#93; = AS;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1768"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1769"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Peel out the prologs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1770"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LS.reset();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1771"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/peelingmoduloscheduleexpander/#a36381ff531e2753fd519d1e4e77cf5ec">Schedule</a>.getNumStages() - 1; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1773"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/peelingmoduloscheduleexpander/#a22dff30982ebb1744a112b4b99b43245">Prologs</a>.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/peelingmoduloscheduleexpander/#a32e5399895869ed336d4d279c20b5f9c">peelKernel</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af33723efd6d9a4cf2146113c13888664ad4f3ea3f9bab85b8c0f86ece54835915">LPD&#95;Front</a>));</span></CodeLine>
