<Link id="l01776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1776"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1777"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1778"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a block that will end up as the new loop exiting block (dominated by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1779"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all prologs and epilogs). It will only contain PHIs, in the same order as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1780"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BB&#39;s PHIs. This gives us a poor-man&#39;s LCSSA with the inductive property</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1781"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that the exiting block is a (sub) clone of BB. This in turn gives us the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1782"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// property that any value deffed in BB but used outside of BB is used by a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1783"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PHI in the exiting block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1784"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;ExitingBB = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/peelingmoduloscheduleexpander/#ae5fdb7e682e1d04dab7282c473a3641b">CreateLCSSAExitingBlock</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1785"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-moduloschedule-cpp-/#af97e2949b56d1bb9fd46f389909d8788">EliminateDeadPhis</a>(ExitingBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/peelingmoduloscheduleexpander/#af50b833f06c9dbd8c5eb4712028e9c76">MRI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/peelingmoduloscheduleexpander/#adfe8c38288fa03fa12d20f67262d19b5">LIS</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;KeepSingleSrcPhi=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1786"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Push out the epilogs, again in reverse order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1787"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can&#39;t assume anything about the minumum loop trip count at this point,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1788"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so emit a fairly complex epilog.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1789"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1790"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We first peel number of stages minus one epilogue. Then we remove dead</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1791"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stages and reorder instructions based on their stage. If we have 3 stages</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1792"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we generate first:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1793"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// E0&#91;3, 2, 1&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1794"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// E1&#91;3&#39;, 2&#39;&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1795"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// E2&#91;3&#39;&#39;&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1796"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And then we move instructions based on their stages to have:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1797"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// E0&#91;3&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1798"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// E1&#91;2, 3&#39;&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1799"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// E2&#91;1, 2&#39;, 3&#39;&#39;&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1800"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The transformation is legal because we only move instructions past</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1801"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions of a previous loop iteration.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1802"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/peelingmoduloscheduleexpander/#a36381ff531e2753fd519d1e4e77cf5ec">Schedule</a>.getNumStages() - 1; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2190"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Generate a pipelined loop that is unrolled by using MVE algorithm and any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// other necessary blocks. The control flow is modified to execute the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pipelined loop if the trip count satisfies the condition, otherwise the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// original loop. The original loop is also used to execute the remainder</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// iterations which occur due to unrolling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2196"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ModuloScheduleExpanderMVE::generatePipelinedLoop() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The control flow for pipelining with MVE:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// OrigPreheader:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // The block that is originally the loop preheader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   goto Check</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // Check whether the trip count satisfies the requirements to pipeline.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (LoopCounter &gt; NumStages + NumUnroll - 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     // The minimum number of iterations to pipeline =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     //   iterations executed in prolog/epilog (NumStages-1) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     //   iterations executed in one kernel run (NumUnroll)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     goto Prolog</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // fallback to the original loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   goto NewPreheader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prolog:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // All prolog stages. There are no direct branches to the epilogue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   goto NewKernel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NewKernel:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2218"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // NumUnroll copies of the kernel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (LoopCounter &gt; MVE-1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     goto NewKernel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   goto Epilog</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Epilog:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // All epilog stages.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (LoopCounter &gt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     // The remainder is executed in the original loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     goto NewPreheader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   goto NewExit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NewPreheader:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // Newly created preheader for the original loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // The initial values of the phis in the loop are merged from two paths.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   NewInitVal = Phi OrigInitVal, Check, PipelineLastVal, Epilog</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   goto OrigKernel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// OrigKernel:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // The original loop block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (LoopCounter != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     goto OrigKernel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   goto NewExit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NewExit:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // Newly created dedicated exit for the original loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // Merge values which are referenced after the loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Merged = Phi OrigVal, OrigKernel, PipelineVal, Epilog</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   goto OrigExit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// OrigExit:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // The block that is originally the loop exit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   // If it is already deicated exit, NewExit is not created.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2251"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2252"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An example of where each stage is executed:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assume #Stages 3, #MVE 4, #Iterations 12</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2319"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Replace MI&#39;s use operands according to the maps.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2320"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ModuloScheduleExpanderMVE::updateInstrUse(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2337"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InitReg = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DefReg = OrigReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DefInst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#ad43bf1af480830a4d6604e969e3f38e9">isPHI</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2341"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++DiffStage;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2342"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2343"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinepipeliner-cpp/#ad4cf8c8e4e2cc5bf94656e979ed629b4">getPhiRegs</a>(&#42;DefInst, OrigKernel, InitReg, LoopReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2344"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LoopReg is guaranteed to be defined within the loop by canApply()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2345"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DefReg = LoopReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2346"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DefInst = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.getVRegDef(LoopReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2347"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DefStageNum = Schedule.getStage(DefInst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2349"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DiffStage += StageNum - DefStageNum;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2350"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> NewReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2351"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PhaseNum &gt;= DiffStage &amp;&amp; CurVRMap&#91;PhaseNum - DiffStage&#93;.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(DefReg))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2352"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NewReg is defined in a previous phase of the same block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2353"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewReg = CurVRMap&#91;PhaseNum - DiffStage&#93;&#91;DefReg&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2354"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!PrevVRMap)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2355"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since this is the first iteration, refer the initial register of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2356"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2357"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewReg = InitReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2358"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2359"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cases where DiffStage is larger than PhaseNum.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2360"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If MI is in the kernel block, the value is defined by the previous</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2361"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iteration and PhiVRMap is referenced. If MI is in the epilog block, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2362"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value is defined in the kernel block and KernelVRMap is referenced.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2363"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewReg = (&#42;PrevVRMap)&#91;PrevVRMap-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() - (DiffStage - PhaseNum)&#93;&#91;DefReg&#93;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2406"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Examples that show which stages are merged by phi.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2407"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Meaning of the symbol following the stage number:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2408"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   a/b: Stages with the same letter are merged (UsePrologReg == true)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2759"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ModuloScheduleTestPass implementation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2760"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2761"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass constructs a ModuloSchedule from its module and runs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2762"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ModuloScheduleExpander.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2763"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2764"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The module is expected to contain a single-block analyzable loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2765"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The total order of instructions is taken from the loop as-is.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2766"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Instructions are expected to be annotated with a PostInstrSymbol.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2767"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This PostInstrSymbol must have the following format:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2768"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &quot;Stage=%d Cycle=%d&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2769"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2770"></CodeLine>
